title: Probiotics
author: Lisa Turner
description: Improve immune function, digestive health or simply improve your overall health by adding probiotics to your daily routine.
cleaned_text: [ 5 Ways to Improve Your Microbiome and Impact Your Mood ](https://www.cleaneatingmag.com/clean-diet/gut-health/5-ways-to-improve-your-microbiome-and-impact-your-mood/) Because the gut and mood are so closely linked, it's important to keep your microbiome healthy. Here's how.
